fields.name: La Roche-Posay Retinol B3 Pure Retinol Serum
fields.description: Working in partnership with dermatologists has given us many innovations in the world of care cosmetics. The La Roche-Posay brand is a vivid example of this! Its new intensive anti-aging serum is designed to fight the first signs of aging. Its formula contains pure retinol combined with sustained-release retinol, which can smooth even deep wrinkles. The product activates the synthesis of collagen and elastin, smoothing the texture of the skin. With regular use, signs of aging caused by solar radiation become less pronounced

fields.name: Hyaluronic Acid Prolonged-Action Serum-Filler
fields.description: Anti-aging serum with hyaluronic acid to reduce wrinkles and restore skin elasticity from the Vichy brand will help maintain the youth of the skin. The formula is based on such components as volcanic water, vitamin Cg, wheat extract and hyaluronic acid. Active ingredients provide penetration to deeper levels, providing a lifting effect. The gentle consistency does not spread and is quickly absorbed, leaving the skin smooth, silky and toned.

fields.name: Facial cleansing foam with lactic acid
fields.description: If your skin is surrounded by the attention of Relance, it can radiate radiance, beauty and youth. The Ukrainian brand creates high-quality cosmetics designed for effective home care. Cleansing foam for washing the face with lactic acid and centella asiatica extract is a source of valuable vitamins and trace elements that make the skin smooth, silky and soft. The product delicately exfoliates, removes impurities, fights inflammation and irritation, and also provides the necessary level of moisture. The product is recommended for daily use and for all skin types.

fields.name: Lotion for narrowing pores micro-exfoliating effect
fields.description: After the cleansing stage, dermatologists recommend using lotion. Especially if you have oily and problematic skin type. The La Roche-Posay brand has released Effaclar Astringent Lotion, which provides quick cleansing of pores and minimizes their visibility. This effect is achieved thanks to the combination of active ingredients and the micro-exfoliating action of LHA (lipohydroxy acid). This is the final step in cleaning problematic skin, suitable for use together with all the usual care products.

fields.name: Cleansing Micellar Foaming Water
fields.description: La Roche-Posay Physiological Cleansing Micellar Foaming Water

fields.name: Gel for deep cleansing of oily, blemish-prone skin
fields.description: Say no to acne breakouts, irritation, flaking and greasy shine with Vichy's Normaderm Phytosolution Gel Purifiant Intense Peaux Grasses! The product, created on the basis of thermal water from volcanic Auvergne thermal springs and natural components, provides complete cleansing, nutrition with vitamins, minerals and eliminates acne breakouts.

fields.name: Nourishing cream for deep recovery for very dry skin
fields.description: Free your excessively dry, problematic and hypersensitive skin from irritation and painful sensations with Nutritic Intense Riche, a healing cream with intensive regenerating action, developed in the laboratory of the La Roche-Posay Scientific Center. Wrapping the skin with its rich consistency, the exclusive cream instantly soothes it, restores the surface layers, increases elasticity and gives surprisingly comfortable sensations.

fields.name: Night care against wrinkles and for skin elasticity
fields.description: LiftActiv Nuit Supreme anti-wrinkle night cream has a comprehensive rejuvenating effect and is suitable for all skin types. A scientific discovery identified the role of the Supreme component, which in an active state regulates the formation of new cells and is capable of rejuvenating the skin at all levels. A cream with a pleasant consistency, enriched with Vichy Spa thermal water, has a soothing, restorative and strengthening effect.

fields.name: Multifunctional regenerating serum
fields.description: Estee Lauder Advanced Night Repair Synchronized Multi-Recovery Complex rejuvenating face serum is an innovative product whose formula is patented until 2033. The tool is able to restore the skin, restore its youth, beauty, elasticity and elasticity. It is recommended to use the night-acting cosmetic product as a prevention of the formation of wrinkles. The unique Chronolux™ Power Signal technology contributes to the instant and high-quality penetration of active components deep into the skin, providing an effect at the cellular level.

fields.name: Anti-Dandruff shampoo for normal and oily hair
fields.description: This shampoo perfectly fights dandruff, and provides not only a quick, but also a long-lasting result, as well as an anti-relapse effect for up to six weeks. It is prescribed for oily hair and irritated scalp, which is prone to peeling and inflammation. The cosmetic product intensively cleanses and saturates with nutrients, and is also able to restore the hair structure. It has a beneficial effect on the scalp, improving its condition, due to which dandruff disappears, and curls delight with a well-groomed appearance. The aroma of peppermint gives a feeling of freshness and lightness.

fields.name: Restorative hair mask with oat extract
fields.description: Has your hair become dry and brittle as a result of frequent blow drying and curling irons? Do not despair, there is a way out. Professional restorative hair mask with oat extract Numero Total Repair Mask from the Italian brand Brelil perfectly copes with these problems!Oat extract is the active component of this miracle remedy.

fields.name: Protein shampoo with collagen
fields.description: Protein shampoo with collagen Esthetic House CP-1 Bright Complex Intense Nourishing Shampoo will provide luxurious professional care for hair of any type, helping to restore even the most damaged curls. The tool is distinguished not only by cleansing, but also nourishing properties, therefore it saturates strands with useful trace elements, providing strengthening and healing care.

fields.name: Mask for intensive restoration
fields.description: L'Oreal Professionnel has been a leader among manufacturers of cosmetic products for more than a hundred years. Thanks to the use of innovative technologies, the study of the latest discoveries of microbiology and talented employees, this French brand enjoys the trust and respect of millions of customers. The Absolut Repair series consists of five professional products designed to care for damaged female strands. Among them is the Gold Quinoa + Protein Mask, which will quickly restore damaged hair, fill it with a healthy shine, make it smooth and elastic.

fields.name: Single-phase liquid crystals
fields.description: This is a great tool that provides curls with protection and a bright shine. Thanks to a special formula containing oil, the hair instantly acquires a diamond shine. And besides, it gets rid of such a problem as split ends. The light liquid quickly restores damaged, brittle hair to life, carefully caring for it. Active components restore the structure of curls, saturating them with necessary vitamins and nutrients.

fields.name: L'Oreal Professionnel serie against hair loss
fields.description: Many men and women are concerned about scalp problems throughout their lives. In response to the most common problems, the L`Oreal Professionnel brand created the Scalp Advanced line - an express for hair and scalp care.Three experienced hairdressing experts took an active part in the development of the line, including selecting and perfecting the formula, testing in the salon, studying the ideal diagnosis of the scalp and developing the most effective and convenient care products.

fields.name: Professional anti-dandruff dermoregulating shampoo
fields.description: Three experienced hairdressing experts took an active part in the development of the line, including selecting and perfecting the formula, testing in the salon, studying the ideal diagnosis of the scalp and developing the most effective and convenient care products. The products of the line are not only effective, their exquisite aroma, which awakens inner naturalness, radiance, freshness, gives vigor and mood, and thick, delicate textures will turn the care procedure into an unparalleled experience.

fields.name: Keratin sulfate-free shampoo
fields.description: Universal soft shampoo effectively cleans curls and scalp, easily removing any impurities, including excess sebum and styling residues. It has a light consistency and does not contain sulfates, which can accumulate, damaging the structure of hair shafts and causing skin irritation. The shampoo formula is developed on the basis of soft washing components that will keep your curls clean and fresh for a long time.

fields.name: Thermal protection spray
fields.description: A stylish styling or a complex hairstyle is created with the help of special tools. Hot air from a hair dryer, high temperatures of curling irons and tongs have a negative effect on the hair structure and can cause their brittleness and dryness. To preserve the health of curls, before styling, you can apply Keratin Color Termoprotector Spray - a special protective spray developed by Phytorelax Laboratories experts. Thanks to the content of keratin and amino acids, the product protects hair fibers from destruction, provides nutrition, hydration and natural shine.

fields.name: Spa Scalp Scaler for cleaning the scalp
fields.description: Enriched with a whole complex of plant extracts, Esthetic House CP-1 Head Spa Scalp Scaler is designed for delicate cleansing and careful healing of the scalp. It restores the broken hydrolipidic balance of the epidermis, intensively saturates it with useful elements and carefully regenerates damaged areas.

fields.name: Perfumed body scrub with shimmer Gold Champ
fields.description: It's amazing how unusual home body care can be! Haven't heard of MARÊVE yet? Then it's time not only to learn about it, but also to plunge into the magical world of beauty together with the unique Gold Champ body scrub! This stunning product combines a quality composition, a fabulous aroma of fruits and flowers, as well as a luxurious shine created by a million of the smallest shimmer particles. Forget about a simple and boring bath or shower! With MARÊVE, everything banal becomes exceptional.

fields.name: Nourishing body cream for dry and very dry skin
fields.description: One of the effective and luxurious beauty products for dry skin care is body oil from the elite brand Lancome. The thick and ultra-nourishing consistency of Body Intense Nourishing & Restoring Body Butter perfectly moisturizes, refreshes and tones the skin, making it supple and soft.

fields.name: Hydrophilic facial cleansing oil
fields.description: Hydrophilic oil is created for thorough and in-depth cleansing of the skin. Today, this product is used as the first stage of cleaning, which instantly removes the remains of decorative products, dirt and sebum. The Relance brand has made sure that your cleansing ritual is useful and varied. Its hydrophilic oil based on almond oil and bergamot extract is a direct proof of this. The combination of active ingredients has a softening, toning and antibacterial effect, so the skin receives a supply of necessary trace elements even at the stage of cleaning.

fields.name: Lancome Idole Body cream for all skin types
fields.description: The Lancome brand was created to introduce the world to French refinement and elegance of style. Brand masters always strive to make product compositions more perfect, so they do not use chemicals that are potentially dangerous to health. A wide assortment allows everyone to find the most suitable cosmetics, which will become his personal source of not only beauty, but also pleasure.

fields.name: Moisturizing La Roche-Posay Lipikar Lait
fields.description: Deep moisturizing milk Lipikar is an innovative development of the scientific center of La Roche-Posay, designed for intensive recovery of excessively dry skin that suffers from increased sensitivity.The ultra-light milk is very quickly absorbed by the surface of the skin, instantly relieving it of uncomfortable sensations of tightness and dryness. The main component of milk - niacinamide, restores damaged and weakened protective barriers, increasing the resistance of the skin to various bacterial infections, wind and hard water, as well as to other external irritants.

fields.name: Coffee body scrub Vanilla
fields.description: There is nothing better than the aromatic tandem of tempting coffee and refined vanilla. SHAKYLAB coffee body scrub with a sweet vanilla scent will turn water procedures into a real pleasure and benefit your skin. The components of the beauty product exfoliate dead skin particles, nourish and moisturize the epidermis. After using the Vanilla scrub, the skin becomes smooth, velvety, elastic and acquires a light coffee aroma.

fields.name: Sugar body scrub Strawberry Mousse
fields.description: Giving your body silky smoothness and a seductive aroma is easy when SHAKYLAB Strawberry Mousse sugar scrub is at hand. The 3-in-1 tool based on 100% ecological raw materials combines the 3 main stages of skin care - cleaning, moisturizing and nutrition.Sugar granules gently exfoliate dead cells, soften dry skin of feet, elbows and knees. Milk proteins kill microbes and stimulate the synthesis of collagen, which increases the elasticity of the body.

fields.name: Soothing cleansing hydrophilic oil
fields.description: Hydrophilic oil for washing IUNIK Calendula Complete Cleansing Oil contains 94% pure vegetable oil: sunflower oil, Chinese lemon tree oil (jojoba) and macadamia nut oil. Five natural oils in the composition of hydrophilic oil are suitable for any type of skin, including sensitive skin.

fields.name: Whitening toothpaste with xylitol
fields.description: Daily use of sugar disrupts the balance of minerals in tooth enamel and makes it brittle. But whitening toothpaste with xylitol brand Marvis will allow you to avoid this! The tool carefully cleans the teeth from food residues and prevents the development of caries. Creamy paste gently polishes and strengthens enamel, whitens it by several tones. The beauty product will give you flawless cleanliness, chic whiteness of your teeth and fresh breath throughout the day!

fields.name: Soothing toothpaste Soft Control
fields.description: Specialists of the Dr.Blanc brand have developed a special series of toothpastes aimed at comprehensively solving problems of the oral cavity. If you experience significant sensitivity of your teeth and gums while brushing, Soft Control soothing paste is the ideal solution. The tool has a unique formula that gently, but at the same time thoroughly cleans the oral cavity, leaving behind only pleasant sensations.

fields.name: Aloe Soothing Sun Cream SPF50+ PA+++
fields.description: Sunscreen cream of the South Korean brand Cosrx is suitable for all skin types, protects it from the sun, softens, soothes, and eliminates inflammation. The product contains aloe vera extract, which has powerful protective and nourishing properties. The product provides an excellent bactericidal effect, stimulates blood microcirculation, controls the level of moisture in cells, and prevents redness.

fields.name: Salt scrub Collistar with natural components
fields.description: The Italian brand Collistar never ceases to delight its fans with high-quality products for body care. The salt scrub, rich in ecologically clean natural components, was no exception.The cosmetic perfectly cleanses the skin, removing the upper keratinized layer. The salt scrub pampers your skin with a carefully selected combination of trace elements, vitamins and minerals. And the plant extracts in the composition of the product intensively nourish the skin and prevent the harmful effects of the environment.

fields.name: Multi-rejuvenating serum Babe Laboratorios brand
fields.description: To prevent the formation of small imperfections, strengthen the hydrolipid mantle of the epidermis - pay attention to the multi-moisturizing serum of the Babe Laboratorios brand! The universal product provides effective restoration of damaged areas of the skin, stimulates the production of natural proteins, accelerates tissue regeneration and cellular renewal. In addition, the Revitalizing Booster strengthens the effect of all care products from the Healthy Aging + series, leaving facial wrinkles and lines no chance.

fields.name: Toner for dry and sensitive facial skin
fields.description: The product is ideal for dry skin, moisturizes it, creating a feeling of comfort, as well as providing smoothness, tenderness and softness. Thanks to the soft formula and the presence of a complex of moisturizing and nourishing substances, wheat and honey extracts, the acid-alkaline and water balance is maintained. Such a lotion completes the process of removing residual cosmetics, does not irritate, provides thorough care, and gives a pleasant feeling of cleanliness.

fields.name: Ultra-concentrated serum Efaclar with a peeling effect
fields.description: Oily skin type often has noticeable flaws. Enlarged pores, rashes, postacne and redness can cause significant discomfort in everyday life. Specialists of the La Roche-Posay brand have developed a new ultra-concentrated serum, thanks to which you will be able to achieve a tangible result after the first uses. Its formula contains three types of synergistic active substances: 3 keratolytic acids, niacinamide and thermal water. This combination of ingredients helps to cope even with persistent defects and improve the quality of the skin from the first days of treatment.

fields.name: Lifting cream with peptide complex
fields.description: If with age the skin has begun to lose its elasticity, and the first signs of its aging are already visible to the naked eye, do not despair. Thanks to the innovative formulas of cosmetic products of the Medi Peel brand, it is easy to fight these phenomena, preserving your youth and beauty for a long time. Lifting cream with a peptide complex has pronounced anti-aging properties. Thanks to the content of five peptides, a complex of ceramides and voluphilin, it increases the firmness and elasticity of the skin, reduces the depth of wrinkles, and makes the relief of the face smoother.

fields.name: Hydrogel eye patch with extracts of lime
fields.description: Due to the two-phase balanced formula with active components, the mask provides a comprehensive approach to the transformation and healing of the skin. The exfoliative essence and the composition with which the fabric is impregnated are enriched with a complex of castor, rosemary, olive and rose oils, extracts of sugar cane, apple, lime, orange and grapefruit. All ingredients have a beneficial effect on the overall condition of the skin, making it smooth and radiant.

fields.name: Levinsohn Master Block All-In-One Mattress Protector
fields.description: Green clay is a highly effective cosmetic product used for deep cleansing of the skin, removal of toxins, narrowing of pores, matting and fight against black spots. The Relance brand has created a unique mask based on it, which, in addition to its main properties, also has soothing and toning properties. All thanks to supplementing the mask with natural bergamot extract, enriched with vitamin C, which helps to even out the tone and brighten the face. With regular use, the Green Clay + Bergamot Extract mask will improve the condition and appearance of the skin.

fields.name: Face mask with hyaluronic acid
fields.description: Hyaluronic acid mask of the Sane brand was created specifically for moisturizing and regeneration of all skin types. The basis of the PatcH2O formula is a molecular patch based on film-forming polymers (hyaluronic acid, alginate and pullulan), enriched with highly concentrated moisturizers. D-panthenol stimulates active division, growth and renewal of cells, participates in the process of creating lipids and proteins, thanks to which it heals wounds, injuries, burns, reduces redness, irritation and inflammatory processes.

fields.name: Facial cleansing foam with succinic acid
fields.description: The SKINBAR brand has released a cleansing foam for the face with succinic acid and rosemary extract, which not only cleans, but also restores the skin. Its toning properties have a beneficial effect on the dermis and give pleasant sensations after washing, without dryness, tightness and irritation. The main components of the foam are succinic acid and rosemary extract. Succinic acid is a strong multitasking component that has antimicrobial, anti-inflammatory properties, and works particularly effectively as an anti-acne agent.
